snippet: Brown is also debating his status in the university’s athletic hall of fame in the wake of the child sexual abuse scandal at Penn State.
abstract: Brown University, Joe Paterno's alma mater, removes Paterno's name from a coaching position and an annual award, and is debating his status in the university's athletic hall of fame in the wake of the child sexual abuse scandal involving Jerry Sandusky and Paterno's role in suppressing it.
lead_paragraph: Brown is also debating his status in the university’s athletic hall of fame in the wake of the child sexual abuse scandal at Penn State.

headline.seo: Joe Paterno’s Alma Mater, Brown, Takes His Name Off Award
headline.main: Paterno’s Alma Mater Takes Name Off Award
headline.print_headline: Paterno’s Alma Mater Takes Name Off Award
